content:
Send Automated Messages in Enhanced Messaging Channels

Using a flow and a notification messaging component, send customers automated messages in enhanced WhatsApp, enhanced SMS, enhanced Apple Messages for Business, Messaging for In-App, or Bring Your Own Channel messaging channels to notify them about a product delivery, case update, or something else.

REQUIRED EDITIONS AND USER PERMISSIONS
Available in: Lightning Experience. View required editions

USER PERMISSIONS NEEDED
To open, edit, or create a flow in Flow Builder: Manage Flow
To create messaging components: Customize Application AND View Setup and Configuration OR System Administrator

Automated messages appear in a customer’s messaging history. They don’t require a response, but if the customer does respond, their response is routed back to your support team.

Step 1: Prepare Your Templates in WhatsApp Business Manager
In Setup, go to the Messaging Settings page.
Copy templates from the original WABA to the new WABA associated with your enhanced channel.
Create new message templates or recreate any that couldn’t be copied.

Step 2: Create Notification Messaging Components
Go to the Messaging Components page in Setup.
Click New Component.
Enter the plain text version of your automated message, using merge fields to add information like the customer’s name or case status. Upload an image, which is used in some component formats.
Optionally, include a rich link in your automated message.
Connect your messaging component to an existing WhatsApp message template.

Step 3: Create a Flow to Send Your Messaging Component
Create a flow that sends the notification messaging component under certain conditions.
Add a collection variable for the Messaging User object.
Add an action to the canvas. Select the Send Conversation Messages action and complete the fields.
Select the collection variable that you created and select your new messaging component.

TIP If needed, agents can also manually send notification messaging components to customers. Click the messaging component action in the messaging window, and select and send the component.
title: Send Automated Messages in Service Cloud
